page.title: 08SPORT IN RECREATION
page.content: Sporting facilities in the town are developing. People want a wide variety of activities. Assoc.football, rugby (league and union),cricket and bowls are well catered for with many amateur clubs for all ages competing in local leagues. Saville Park offers a running track and tennis courts. The new swimming pool(1984) is providing activities for many different groups including the disabled. Clubs for Martial Arts, Badminton and Gymnastics use school halls and public buildings. The Snooker Centre and BMX Track are recent additions drawing participants from the surrounding area. Spectator professional sports to the level of County Cricket and top class Rugby League exist in town. Not found here are golf, sports centre, water sports which may arrive in the future.
